name: sample-configure-srt-stream
description: Sample application to demonstrate how to use configureSRTStream API

scripts.copy-resource: mkdirp dist/app && copyfiles -V -u 1 ./resource/avid-manifest.json ./resource/**/* ./dist/app && copyfiles -V -u 1 ./src/*.html ./dist/app/src && copyfiles -V -u 1 ./resource/static/**/* ./dist/app/src && copyfiles -V -u 1 ./src/css/main.css ./dist/app/src
scripts.prebuild: npm run copy-grpc-web && npm run copy-resource
scripts.clean-dev: npm run clean-grpc-web && npm run clean-dist
scripts.clean-all: npm run clean-grpc-web && npm run clean-dist && npm run clean-node-modules
scripts.prepackage: npm run build && npm run clean-packages
